text: Atahpara tini yakhana taderake bipadamukta karena takhana tara yamine an'yayabhabe simalanghana karate thake [1]. He manusa! Tomadera simalanghana kebala tomadera nijedera prati'i haye thake [2]; duniyara jibanera sukha bhoga kare na'o [3], pare amadera'i kache tomadera pratyabartana. Takhana amara tomaderake janiye deba tomara ya karate
